long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See Less Blue helps keep artificially inflated Twitter Blue users from being visible on your feed. 

Twitter Blue users disproportionately cause harassment, spam, and general bad behavior. Their visibility crowds out the users many people on Twitter want to engage with. 

If you notice any bugs, or want to request more features, please feel free to visit https://github.com/markus-leben/SeeLessBlue/issues.
